reviewText:
Want to know what its like to go through U.S. Army Airborne  school?
Well, here is your chance!!
With George C. Scott announcing the  proceedings (priceless!) you see the early U.S. Army Airborne jump from  C-47s and into WWII, Korea, Vietnam, Grenada, Panama before joining the  1-507th at Army jump school at Fort Benning, Georgia!
If you want to see  why the Airborne is America's best, get this video!
Airborne!
